text:
Hi Atanu,
 
We are a software development company. We are using Apache HTTP Server 
2.0.52 as a web server one of our projects. Tuxedo 8.1 is used as a TP 
Monitor. 
We have written a few CGI scrips and a few modules that invoke Tuxedo 
calls.
We are facing a problem when we use Apache 2. When invoking a tuxedo 
initialization API call, it fails. But the same CGI andmodule works with 
Apache 1.3 with Tuxedo 8.1.
 
We feel this might be due to some configuration change needed for 
Apache 2.052.
Could you please let us know how we could resolve this issue?
 
Thanks,
Nilima
creator: nilimajain2004@yahoo.com
nick@webthing.com
text:
There's nothing in this I can parse as a bug report.  Please provide details of
an issue that might be fixable, or ask in a user support forum.
